name: A Squirrels Tale
description:
WASD to move (Hold Shift to go faster.)

E to pick up 

Q to drop/throw. 

Find acorns and fill the crates by the bridge near the pond. :)

There currently is no win condition, you could probably play forever. The crates will fill up though, so maybe not! :)

Credits

Assets :

Crates

Environment

Squirrel

Acorn

Third Person Controller
